hero.intro: I'm Jakub Dolének, and I can't resist automating the boring stuff.
hero.description: I love turning repeatable workflows into orchestrated systems so products ship faster without losing the personal touch.
hero.portraitCaption: Automation frees me to focus on the craft and the people behind every project.

projects.heading: Projects
projects.subheading: Follow the river to explore each build, its story, and stack.

network-automation.title: Network automation toolkit
network-automation.summary: Composable CLI and workflow library that orchestrates configuration drift checks, intent validation, and zero-downtime changes across Cisco Nexus and Juniper fabrics.
network-automation.impact: Reduced manual change windows by 45% and prevented misconfigurations with pre-flight guardrails.

incident-simulator.title: Incident readiness simulator
incident-simulator.summary: Browser-based lab that spins up containerized network topologies, injects latency or packet loss, and guides responders through incident runbooks.
incident-simulator.impact: Improved on-call response time by 30% and created reusable training scenarios for new hires.

portfolio.title: Personal portfolio
portfolio.summary: The site you are browsingï¿½crafted with React, Tailwind, and thoughtful micro-animations to present my work and background.
portfolio.impact: Highlights core projects, skills, and a bit of personality while keeping performance and accessibility in check.

skills.heading: Expertise snapshot
skills.subheading: From core routing to front-end polishï¿½here is what I work with daily.

networking.title: Networking & infrastructure
networking.description: Routing, switching, WAN, SD-WAN, firewalls, and hybrid connectivity.

automation.title: Automation & reliability
automation.description: Repeatable deployments, testing pipelines, and observability.

cloud.title: Cloud & platforms
cloud.description: Modern infrastructure platforms for app and service delivery.

frontend.title: UI & collaboration
frontend.description: Helping teams understand complex systems with purposeful interfaces.

contact.heading: Let's build something resilient
contact.description: Whether you need help scaling a network, hardening reliability, or bringing ideas to life, I'd love to hear from you.

about.title: About Jakub
about.intro: My path into networking started with curiosity about how packets find their way across the world. Today, I help teams ship dependable services by pairing solid infrastructure with automation and observability.

snapshot.focus: Focus: network design, automation, and site reliability
snapshot.mindset: Mindset: collaborative, measurement-driven, and calm under pressure

timeline.title: Network engineer
timeline.location: Enterprise service provider ï¿½ Brno, CZ
timeline.description: Lead technical ownership for multi-site WAN redesign, implemented IaC pipelines with Terraform, and automated configuration compliance.

timeline.title: NOC / infrastructure analyst
timeline.description: Maintained 24/7 operations, built internal dashboards for incident visibility, and coordinated cross-team response routines.

timeline.title: Brno University of Technology
timeline.description: Bachelor studies focused on computer networks, distributed systems, and applied security.

values.title: Reliability-first
values.description: I design with rollback plans, metrics, and failure drills in mind so launches feel boring (in the best way).

values.title: Empathy for operators
values.description: Clear runbooks, observability, and human-friendly tooling help teams move faster and feel confident.

values.title: Continuous learning
values.description: From labbing new routing protocols to experimenting with UI micro-interactions, I'm always exploring.
